title: Pantree
description: Pantree is a web application designed to optimize and simplify recipe searching and meal planning for individuals and families. Pantree specifically helps users cook with the food they have in their home, organizing their pantry items by expiration date and finding recipe results from the items in the home.

title: README Generator
description: README Generator is a node.js application used to create quick, simple README.md file for your projects. The application was originally built to run in a node environment. I am currently developing a front end website for the application to make it more accessable and appealing to developers.

title: Exercise Wars
description: Excercise Wars is a social network designed to help people stay physically active and challenge their friends to fun, creative exercise routines. This project was built as a MERN stack application, utilizing prominent technologies, including React, Redux, Express, Node.js and Amazon S3.

title: Celebrity Twin
description: Celebrity Twin is an entertainment application where one can upload an image of themself and discover their celebrity doppelg√§nger! This application demostrates the implentation of basic front-end web design, including html/css, jQuery, and AJAX.

title: Odd-Man Lineup Optimization
description: During the BYU Men's Hockey 2018-2019 season, I worked as the team statistician, recording boxscores and conducting analytical result for the team. Click on the view icon below to see the powerpoint presentation to my findings.
